description:
Gurski Law Firm, is a Galveston, Texas, injury and criminal defense law firm with an international scope. We are selective regarding the clients we represent, choosing cases that require our blend of advanced litigation experience, commercial law background and personal attention.

Trial Lawyers For Complex Cases

Our lead attorneys have extensive experience planning and arguing cases of great importance. We have a former state representative, a career litigator and a seasoned criminal defense attorney on our leadership team.

We are a litigation law firm, and we are always ready for trial. We understand how state attorneys and insurance defenders plan their strategies - we know because we have direct experience in these positions. This experience empowers us to outthink and outmaneuver our opponents.

A Law Firm With A Selective Caseload

Clients who come to Gurski Law Firm, never need to worry about feeling like just another case number. Our goal is to understand every aspect of each case we take on. This provides the highest level of service possible. It also helps us pass our understanding along to our adversaries in negotiations and to juries during trial.

Serious Representation For Those Who Need It

Every personal injury or criminal defense case could benefit from a lawyer. Clients who face highly complex or challenging situations in the areas of personal injury or criminal law may contact us directly. We offer virtual appointments and accept credit card payments.
